title: Ticket #6489: SlotMergeConstraint in startd cron output ignored if _PREFIX set.
description:
If STARTD_CRON_<JobName>_PREFIX is set and the output of JobName includes SlotMergeConstraint, it will be ignored because the prefix is applied before we look for the slot attributes which define the ad's merge target(s).

I expect this to be a problem when implementing MACHINE_RESOURCE_STATUS_<NAME>; otherwise, we could just document the fix.
creator: tlmiller
